title: perth based players
body: Looking for perth based players that would like to have a few games or practice, maybe even start a team.

replies.body: sent ashal and i have joined thee Perth page cheers guys hopefully ill see u on there.

There's a Facebook page dedicated to WA players - called League of Legends Perth n' WA

Has about 1200 members in it. 

You can probably find some people to team up with there.
